summary: Diff adds a static HTML entry point for the /coupon route and replaces the Motoko backend actor with an empty actor. There is no evidence in the provided diff summary of changes that explicitly promote a draft deployment to live/production, and the backend change appears unrelated to the stated goals and violates the stated constraint to respect the existing backend architecture.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify and fix the deployment/build error preventing successful deploy; ensure clean build/deploy and both '/' and '/coupon' routes render.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not provide direct evidence that the deployment/build error was identified and fixed end-to-end (e.g., config/build pipeline/deploy settings). It also shows backend/main.mo reduced to an empty actor, which could break existing functionality rather than fix deployment. While adding frontend/public/coupon/index.html may help /coupon refresh routing, that alone does not demonstrate a clean build + successful IC deploy + runtime correctness.

missing_requirements.requirement: Promote the currently deployed draft Valentine app to the live production environment (make the draft go live).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of any production/draft promotion mechanism changes (e.g., deployment config, environment switching, release steps, CI/CD, dfx configuration) is present in the diff summary.
evidence: <file-diff> summary shows no deployment/config changes beyond app files

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor logic removed/replaced with an empty Motoko actor (potentially disabling existing backend behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing a deployment/build error and promoting a draft to live while respecting the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture. Replacing backend/main.mo with `actor {};` is not requested and appears to be an unrelated/destructive change rather than a targeted deployment fix.
